channel.title: Throne of Lies Immunity Table
channel.description:
[ToL Immunity Table](https://goo.gl/gLLQzN) :eyes:
Hi guys :smiley:,
I have been working on a project for all of you to utilize, it may not be the prettiest, but I tried to simplify it as easily as possible. I'm hoping we can add it to the wiki fairly soon.
It's an immunity table! I know in the recent days that players have been asking about which classes are occupy immune, and why they couldn't kill a specific player, etc. The in-game wiki does specify if a class is immune to something, however this is not available in an easy-to-read format. This is my temporary solution.
It's currently being polished right now, and there may be mistakes. Please let me know if there are mistakes! Thank you!

ToL Immunity Table

Hi guys ,

I have been working on a project for all of you to utilize, it may not be the prettiest, but I tried to simplify it as easily as possible. I’m hoping we can add it to the wiki fairly soon.

It’s an immunity table! I know in the recent days that players have been asking about which classes are occupy immune, and why they couldn’t kill a specific player, etc. The in-game wiki does specify if a class is immune to something, however this is not available in an easy-to-read format. This is my temporary solution.

It’s currently being polished right now, and there may be mistakes. Please let me know if there are mistakes! Thank you!
